data.actual_result: You can enter text in it, just not submit the message.
data.short_description: Joining a channel without read message perms in a tableflip server lets you type in the message box saying you have no permissions
data.steps_to_repro: - Join a server with tableflip using an invite pointing to a closed channel you don't have perms to type in - Tap on the message box telling you you can't use it
